name: A Right Adjoint that does not Preserve all Colimits
definition: The forgetful functor $U: \mathbf{Grp} \to \mathbf{Set}$ is a right adjoint (its left adjoint is the free group functor). However, $U$ does not preserve all colimits. For example, it does not preserve coequalizers in general.
comments: Right adjoints preserve limits but generally do not preserve colimits.
